blogPost.excerpt: Yep, it's one of those stash services again. But I don't think there's been one focused only on resources to supercharge designers, entrepreneurs, founders, indie-makers, side-hustlers and anyone building digital products or services. Lifetime access🎉
blogPost.body: Yep, it's one of those stash services again. But I don't think there's been one focused only on resources to supercharge designers, entrepreneurs, founders, indie-makers, side-hustlers and anyone building digital products or services. Lifetime access🎉
blogPost.title: Zupermaker - 1000+ tools & resources to grow and supercharge your skills
blogPost.author: O'day 🧸

localize.description: 是的，这又是那些藏匿服务之一。但我认为还没有一个只专注于资源，为设计师、创业者、创始人、独立制作人、副业者和任何构建数字产品或服务的人提供超级充电。终身访问🎉
localize.tagline: 1000+工具和资源，让你的技能得到成长和提升。

localize.description: 是的，這又是那些藏匿服務之一。但我認爲還沒有一個只專注於資源，爲設計師、創業者、創始人、獨立製作人、副業者和任何構建數字產品或服務的人提供超級充電。終身訪問🎉
localize.tagline: 1000+工具和資源，讓你的技能得到成長和提升。

previous.title: Pullbacks only look healthy when they happen in other people's stocks.

localize.full_text: 回调只有发生在别人的股票上，才显得健康。
回調只有發生在別人的股票上，才顯得健康。

next.excerpt: Eco puts your money back to work for you. It's a single balance that lets you spend, send, save and make money at the same time. Earn 2.5-5% on your balance, plus get 5% cashback at merchants. And, soon, pay bills and send money to friends for more rewards.
next.title: The Eco App - One simple balance for saving, spending, and making money.

localize.description: Eco让你的钱重新为你工作。它是一个单一的余额，让你消费，发送，储蓄和赚钱在同一时间。赚取2.5-5%的余额，并在商家获得5%的现金回馈。而且，很快就可以支付账单和寄钱给朋友，获得更多奖励。
localize.tagline: 储蓄、消费、赚钱的一个简单平衡。

localize.description: Eco讓你的錢重新爲你工作。它是一個單一的餘額，讓你消費，發送，儲蓄和賺錢在同一時間。賺取2.5-5%的餘額，並在商家獲得5%的現金回饋。而且，很快就可以支付賬單和寄錢給朋友，獲得更多獎勵。
localize.tagline: 儲蓄、消費、賺錢的一個簡單平衡。
